name: CozyWinterChill
description:
Created for: Winter MelonJam 2022

This is a game whose goal is not to die of boredom)) Well, in fact, I spent most of the time creating "coziness" and did not have time to add gameplay. You can use this "game" as a background for a stream or something.

  • All code created by me.
  • Models from: https://www.cgtrader.com
  • Textures from: https://3djungle.ru/textures
  • Icons from: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons
  • Sounds from: https://zvukipro.com
  • Main music from:
